description: Smalruby 3 telemetry modal label - for accessibility
First paragraph of body text for telemetry opt-in modal
defaultMessage: The Smalruby Team is always looking to better understand how Smalruby is used around the world. To help support this effort, you can allow Smalruby to automatically send usage information to the Smalruby Team.

description: First paragraph of body text for telemetry opt-in modal
defaultMessage: The information we collect includes language selection, blocks usage, and some events like saving, loading, and uploading a project. We DO NOT collect any personal information.

description: Text for telemetry modal opt-out button
Tooltip for telemetry modal opt-out button
Text for telemetry modal opt-in button
defaultMessage: Yes, I'd like to help improve Smalruby

description: Tooltip for telemetry modal opt-in button
